title: Linear Search: All Indices
description: Implement `linearSearchAll(arr, target)` that returns an array of ALL indices where `target` occurs in `arr`. Return an empty array if not found.

easy: Pseudo-code: let res=[]; for i in [0..n): if arr[i]===target push i; return res;
Remember: the result may be empty.
medium: Create a result array and push matching indices
Loop through the whole array; don't stop at the first match
hard: Initialize an empty array and return it at the end
